Content: I don't like this no capitalism no climate change stuff it's pretty stupid tbh
We saw rapid growth in emissions and environmental issues in AES
Yeah but ending capitalism won't automatically solve climate change
Capital is literally money that accumulates on itself

The long term and short term debt cycles exist sure_ but you don't see all the capital destroyed within it. Productive forces are immensely higher then they were in the 1800s_ even if we saw a few long term debt crashes
The capital stock isn't destroyed in full with these crashes_ it still accumulates.
Capitalism is a totality_ a mode of production based on capital
Capital has become financialized_ not focused on real economic activity anymore
<@304231068796715009> private control of the MoP isn't capitalism lol

<@378627967435145219> what?NLhis claim was capitalism was based on private ownership I pointed out how other forms of production had private ownership and property relations. It didn't embody the scale of modern capitalist industry or it's expansionist nature ofc
Urban burghers owned limited manufacturing and what not in late fedualism_ the plot was private to the king_ and worked on by the serfs.
